Modifications.Value: Akama strikes a target from the shadows, then enters shadow state. His attack speed increases by 100% for 5 seconds, and he charges towards the enemy. During the charge, he's immune to all damage and uncontrollable. Once reaching the target, he deals 200 damage. If the target isn't a hero and its HP is below 20%, Akama executes it and refreshes the ability cooldown.

Akama strikes a target from the shadows, then enters shadow state. His attack speed increases by 150% for 6 seconds, and he charges towards the enemy. During the charge, he's immune to all damage and uncontrollable. Once reaching the target, he deals 250 damage. If the target isn't a hero and its HP is below 25%, Akama executes it and refreshes the ability cooldown.

Akama strikes a target from the shadows, then enters shadow state. His attack speed increases by 200% for 7 seconds, and he charges towards the enemy. During the charge, he's immune to all damage and uncontrollable. Once reaching the target, he deals 300 damage. If the target isn't a hero and its HP is below 30%, Akama executes it and refreshes the ability cooldown.

Akama strikes a target from the shadows, then enters shadow state. His attack speed increases by 250% for 8 seconds, and he charges towards the enemy. During the charge, he's immune to all damage and uncontrollable. Once reaching the target, he deals 350 damage. If the target isn't a hero and its HP is below 35%, Akama executes it and refreshes the ability cooldown.
